html:
5.29.20  1:50 pm   Sometimes i write lyrics in my dreams, do you do that too?

      only if they have melodies too

5.29.20  1:50 pm   How do I create dreams?

      everything you do creates dreams. you are creating dreams constantly whether you want to or not

5.29.20  1:37 pm   How was JFK assassinated?

      somehow using a grassy knoll, but the problem is i don't know what the heck a knoll is

5.29.20  1:36 pm   whens the next video

      i'm having a countdown timer

5.29.20  1:31 pm   What was your best experience?

      i would prefer to think it's sometime in the future

5.29.20  1:30 pm   Why are you so cool?

      could be some type of defense mechanism

5.29.20  1:12 pm   What is the inspiration behind might quit?

      a melody from a dream

5.29.20  1:11 pm   why are you so specific about the date and timing when answering questions?

      it's actually not specific enough. if you don't believe me, then take a look at this question, which i will attempt to identify using its exact timestamp: 3.25.20  11:17 pm

5.29.20  12:59 pm   Help "might quit" is my life story and it's almost scary

      that seems like a nice story

5.29.20  12:54 pm   What do you use to edit your videos?

      we'll see

5.29.20  12:50 pm   Do you like and enjoy the process of making new music and videos?

      oh hell yeah

5.29.20  12:47 pm   Will you make a new video

      yes but more than 1

5.29.20  12:47 pm   What is your opinion of Bananas?

      good way to point at something. best fruit for pointing

5.29.20  12:45 pm   what instrument did you start out on?

      possibly piano

5.29.20  12:27 pm   what is your favorite font that starts with e

      eggs (it's just eggs)

5.29.20  12:25 pm   A billion monkeys might be able to write shakespeare,

     i thought shakespeare writing was called that because it was written by a particular person (William Shakespeare)

     but do you think they will ever be able to write a bill wurtz song?

     no, i think that means it has to be written by me

5.29.20  12:02 pm   I started doing audio journals, to remove some of the barriers of traditional note-taking, and so far it is pretty good, except that when I turn that mic on for some reason by brain kind of goes blank, and it seems that when this happens I am not really capturing the internal dialogue. It is almost like some kind of stage fright. Ever encountered that? Ideas on overcoming, or is it just one of those things that need to be pushed through?

      you just have to get used to it. be open about the horrendous reality that you are talking to a recording. you have to understand the audacity that may have brought your life to this point. and embrace it. for the first few days you will want to introduce it as such, 'welcome back to i am a creepy no-one loser who talks to themself.' i think that will make everyone feel more comfortable. and eventually you won't need to do that anymore

5.29.20  11:43 am   What is art for you?

      science

5.29.20  11:19 am   will you warn us the day before you release something?

      no. well, yes sort of

5.29.20  11:13 am   How do you make your videos?

      we'll find out

5.29.20  11:08 am   how often do you remember what happens in your dreams? what's something interesting that has happened in one of your recent dreams?

      i was hanging out with Leonardo DiCaprio and his mom, and then they got a call from his dad. while talking on the call, they were talking in a trans-atlantic accent. so i said "why are you talking in a trans-atlantic accent? does your dad speak in a trans-atlantic accent?" and they said yes. and i said, in my best trans-atlantic accent, "Oh, that's marvelous!" "Fantastic!" "Wonderful!" and i asked them "was that any good" and they said "no"

5.29.20  10:49 am   When you made the "just did a bad thing" song, did you actually do a bad thing?

      yes. i accidentally ruined the 2 week song schedule, which currently remains ruined to this day

5.29.20  10:44 am   Should I be scared

      occasionally

5.29.20  10:44 am   will you make new videos

      oh hell yes

5.29.20  10:40 am   Are you going to make new videos soon?

      oh hell yes

5.29.20  10:27 am   what do you need to write a song

      you need to be very aLiVe, but if you think you are not, don't worry that means you are. thinking is a sign of life. but even that's not the only sign

5.29.20  10:16 am   what's your favourite size of the hexagon?

      0.5176

5.29.20  10:16 am   do you think sometimes you can express more without words than using words?

      yes

5.29.20  10:15 am   What's the font you always use? 

      the default on this site is whatever your browser is set to. the default as i type this, is courier (i think). the default when normally typing rich text (rtf) is helvetica

5.29.20  10:05 am   Sorry if lots of people ask but what are you working on?

      re-inventing the graphics department. i did not plan this. it's just happening

5.29.20  10:03 am   are you gonna make more documentary videos?

      that sounds like a good idea

5.29.20  9:57 am   Why do you make everyone's life better and fill us all with joy?

      it's a long term business strategy

5.29.20  9:55 am   What is pizza

      like a frisbee, with more enhanced flavour

5.29.20  9:49 am   Am I a good person

      how often do you frown. if you frown a lot that means you're a good person

5.29.20  9:41 am   you seem skinny. how do you avoid gaining weight? 

      run from my problems

5.29.20  9:37 am   What's your favorite ice cream flavor?

      XXtreme protein blast

5.29.20  9:35 am   do you watch through your videos/songs in their entirety once you've finished working on the last thing that you wanted to work on or do you just throw them out there because you've forced yourself to be less perfectionist?

      i do a series of different types of checks. full lean-back playthrough for general impression, slower and close-up detail inspection, spell check, those are the main types of checks

5.29.20  9:34 am   Do you think we can understand what we want ?

      sometimes

5.29.20  9:32 am   Have you ever tried methadone?

     no

      Would you like to try methadone?

     no

      Is methadone your favourite drug?

     no

      Will you make a song about methadone?

     maybe

      Should I try methadone? Are you curious as to why I am asking you about methadone?

     no

      By the way, what about bath salts?

     don't know

      Do you take bath salts?

     no

      What are withdrawal symptoms from bath salts like?

      i don't know

5.29.20  9:29 am   what's your opinion on frogs?

      a bit jumpy

5.29.20  9:25 am   spell Icup

      not necessary. you already did

5.29.20  9:02 am   Who's the candyman?

      no one. candy is made by machines

5.29.20  8:41 am   do you plan to make more music?

      extremely yes

5.29.20  8:08 am   What are clouds? 

      piles of rain, in the sky

5.29.20  7:38 am   How do you stuff

      well that just doesn't seem plausible, nor feasible

5.29.20  7:16 am   What is the meaning behind hello sexy pants

      in hindsight, i'm thinking it might actually be about a sexy desk

5.29.20  7:14 am   Is life a simulation?

      of what

5.29.20  6:49 am   How did you decide your way to live?

      still deciding, but the only way i could explain it is in song. songs are almost the only way to explain how to decide something

5.29.20  6:00 am   Will there ever be new reality videos?

      oh heck yeah

5.29.20  5:14 am   How do you come up with your lyrics?

      musically
